<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Viper's Fang](/Equipment.aspx?ID=238)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 569 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 850 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to a weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Reaction" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

**Trigger** A creature within your reach uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged attack, or leaves a square during a moving action it's using

**Requirement** You are a master with the affixed weapon
</row>

</column>

---

When you activate this resin-strengthened viper skull, you make an [Attack of Opportunity](/Actions.aspx?ID=8) against the triggering creature.

 If you have Attack of Opportunity, you can activate the _viper’s fang_ as a free action.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Viper's Fang
requirement: You are a master with the affixed weapon
